rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0001
rows.name:
You've got quite the
collection of Blades there!

rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Are you making efficient use of
Blade Switching during battle?

rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0003
rows.name:
If you can get to grips with the
system, it'll really open up
your elemental combo options.

rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Understanding your Blades'
traits and planning ahead
is half the battle!

rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Whew. It's hard work dishing
out advice like this.

rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0006
rows.name:
As a Driver scout, I mostly deal with
complete rookies, and there's no point
telling them about advanced strategy.

rows.label: tlk45320121_04_msg0007
rows.name:
"Focus on the Crystal and try to
awaken a good Blade!" is about the
extent of the advice I get to give.
